    • getDefaultTenant

      Tenant getDefaultTenant() throws TenantNotFoundException
      Get default tenant.
      Returns:
      Tenant object
      Throws:
      TenantNotFoundException - occurs when the identifier does not refer to an existing tenant
      InvalidSessionException - Generic exception thrown if API Session is invalid, e.g session has expired.
      Since:
      6.0

    • getDefaultTenantId

      long getDefaultTenantId() throws TenantNotFoundException
      Get the default tenant id !! Internal use only !! Tenant notion should be removed soon.
      Returns:
      the default tenant id
      Throws:
      TenantNotFoundException - if cannot retrieve tenant from database

    • updateTenant

      @Deprecated(since="7.14.0") Tenant updateTenant(long tenantId, TenantUpdater updater) throws UpdateException
      Deprecated.
      since 7.14 Since the multi-tenancy will be abandoned in the future, it is not recommended to use those methods. See https://documentation.bonitasoft.com/bonita/2022.1/multi-tenancy-and-tenant-configuration for more details
      Update a tenant with its tenantId and new content.
      Parameters:
      tenantId - the tenant identifier
      updater - the update descriptor
      Returns:
      Tenant object
      Throws:
      UpdateException - occurs when an exception is thrown during tenant updated
      InvalidSessionException - Generic exception thrown if API Session is invalid, e.g session has expired.
      Since:
      6.0

    • getInformation

      Map<String,String> getInformation() throws PlatformNotFoundException
      Retrieves a Map containing all relevant platform information
      Returns:
      a Map containing all relevant platform information
      Throws:
      PlatformNotFoundException - if the platform does not exist
      Since:
      7.1.0
